desc: This intermediate-level course assumes students have a substantial understanding of ceramic processes, plus a good awareness of their own interests in the realm of ceramic expression. The instructor helps students focus their efforts by proposing specific areas of investigation. Materials fee. Offered annually. Prerequisite: ART 207. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor.
name: Intermediate Ceramics
prerequisites: Prerequisite: ART 207. Previous studio experience in ceramics is accepted when approved by the instructor.

Theinstructor helps students focus their efforts by proposing specific areas ofinvestigation.Materials fee. Offered annually. Prerequisite: ART 103 or ART 207.
